lead_paragraph: Maja Daniels spent almost a year talking to hospital staff and patients before starting her project about dementia.

headline.print_headline: Memory Palace: Opening a Door on Dementia
headline.main: ‘Into Oblivion’ Uses Photography to Examine Lives of Dementia Patients

snippet: Maja Daniels spent almost a year talking to hospital staff and patients before starting her project about dementia....
abstract: Into Oblivion, project from photographer Maja Daniels, focuses on dementia patients at St Thomas de Villeneuve hospital in Bain-de-Bretagne, France; project won grant from The Bob and Diane Fund, which sponsors visual storytelling about dementia.
